alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Jackson; Natchitoches; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 2:13AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jackson, northeastern Natchitoches, southeastern Bienville and northern Winn Parishes through 300 AM CST... At 213 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles west of Jonesboro to 16 miles northwest of Winnfield to 8 miles east of Campti. Movement was east northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Winnfield, Jonesboro, Chatham, Hodge, Goldonna, North Hodge, Dodson, East Hodge, Saline, Lucky, Calvin, Bienville, Quitman, Eros, Sikes, Hudson, Friendship, Joyce, Liberty Hill and Mount Olive. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
